meanings.definition: Relating to the apostles or their teachings.
meanings.sent1: The church followed the apostolic teachings closely.
meanings.sent2: The apostolic tradition is important in Christianity.
meanings.sent3: The apostolic advice on fishing was to be patient.
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to the apostolic way of life was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The apostolic influence shaped the early church profoundly.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the pope or the papacy.
meanings.sent1: The apostolic blessing from the pope was a great honor.
meanings.sent2: The apostolic palace is where the pope resides.
meanings.sent3: The apostolic hat was a symbol of authority.
meanings.sent4: Her visit to the apostolic city was unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The apostolic authority of the pope was respected worldwide.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a succession of spiritual authority.
meanings.sent1: The apostolic succession ensured continuity in leadership.
meanings.sent2: The apostolic line of authority was carefully maintained.
meanings.sent3: The apostolic power was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent4: Her family had a long history of apostolic leadership.
meanings.sent5: The apostolic connection to the divine was evident in their rituals.
